# gitea_org (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about an existing Gitea organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the organization to look up.

### Read-Only

- `avatar_url` (String) URL to the organization's avatar image.
- `description` (String) The description of the organization.
- `email` (String) The email address of the organization.
- `full_name` (String) The full display name of the organization.
- `id` (Number) The numeric ID of the organization.
- `location` (String) The location of the organization.
- `repo_admin_change_team_access` (Boolean) Whether repository administrators can change team access permissions.
- `visibility` (String) The visibility level of the organization (`public`, `limited`, or `private`).
- `website` (String) The website URL of the organization.
